name: INPC_UNFAVOR_HISTO
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field INPC Unfavorable Histopathology.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INPC_UNFAV_HISTOP_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification (INPC) Unfavorable Histopathology

Less than 18 months old; neuroblastoma (Schwannian stroma-poor) or nodular ganglioneu
18 months up to less than 5 years old; neuroblastoma (Schwannian stroma-poor)
